snippet: Works by Peter Lieberson, an American composer who died in 2011, were explored at Mannes College’s Beethoven Institute.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews concert of works by Beethoven and Peter Lieberson performed by the Beethoven Institute at Mannes College.
lead_paragraph: Works by Peter Lieberson, an American composer who died in 2011, were explored at Mannes College’s Beethoven Institute.

headline.seo: Beethoven Institute at Mannes College the New School for Music
headline.main: A Contemporary Dialogue With Beethoven’s Sonatas
